data.chText: 长期的；慢性的；难以治愈（或根除）的
data.enText: lasting for a long time; difficult to cure or get rid of

data.chText: 慢性支气管炎 / 关节炎 / 哮喘
该国长期存在的失业问题
农村地区住房的长期匮乏
data.enText: a chronic shortage of housing in rural areas
having had a disease for a long time

data.chText: 慢性酒精中毒者；长期抑郁症患者

data.enText: a hospital for the chronically ill

simple_means.memory_skill: chron 时间 + ic …的 → 长期的；慢性的

tr: being long-lasting and recurrent or characterized by long suffering

value.def: A chronic illness or disability lasts for a very long time.

example.ex: Most of them were chronically ill.
example.tran: 他们多数人患有慢性病。

value.def: You can describe someone's bad habits or behaviour as chronic when they have behaved like that for a long time and do not seem to be able to stop themselves.

example.ex: Anyone who does not believe that smoking is an addiction has never been a chronic smoker.
example.tran: 不相信抽烟能上瘾的人肯定不是老烟民。

value.tran: 难以根除的;积习难改的

value.def: A chronic situation or problem is very severe and unpleasant.

example.ex: One cause of the artist's suicide seems to have been chronic poverty...
example.tran: 那位艺术家自杀的一个原因似乎是极端贫困。

example.ex: There is a chronic shortage of patrol cars in this police district.
example.tran: 这个治安辖区严重缺乏巡逻车辆。

example.ex: Research and technology are said to be chronically underfunded.
example.tran: 据说为研究和技术方面提供的经费严重不足。

trans: 慢性疲劳综合征(常使用缩略形式 CFS)

partsOfSpeech.dec: chron 时间 + ic …的 → 长期的；慢性的
chron 时间 + icle 小 →〔记录〕一小段时间〔内发生的事件〕→ 编年史
chrono 时间 + graph 写，画 → 记录时间 → 精密记时器
chrono 时间 + log 说 + ical …的 → 按照时间来讲述 → 按年代顺序的
chrono 时间 + logy …学 → 年代学；年表
chrono 时间 + meter 测量计 → 精密计时器
syn 共同 + chron 时间 + ize 使 → 同时发生
syn 共同；同时 + chron 时间 + ous …的 → 同期的；同步的
